verses.verse: <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> all that <S%H452>Elijah<s%> had <S%H6213>done,<s%> and how he had <S%H2026>killed<s%> all the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Then <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "So let the <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3254>me,<s%> and more <S%H7760>also,<s%> if I don't make your <S%H5315>life<s%> as the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> of them by <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time!<s%>"

When he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H6965>that,<s%> he arose, and <S%H3212>went<s%> for his <S%H5315>life,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> which belongs to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3240>left<s%> his servant <S%H5288>there.<s%>

But he himself <S%H1980>went<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%>'s <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and sat <S%H3427>down<s%> under <S%H259>a<s%> juniper <S%H7574>tree:<s%> and he <S%H7592>requested<s%> for <S%H5315>himself<s%> that he might <S%H4191>die,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is <S%H7227>enough.<s%> <S%H3068>Now,<s%> O Yahweh, take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H5315>life;<s%> for I am not <S%H2896>better<s%> than my <S%H1>fathers.<s%>"

He <S%H7901>lay<s%> down and <S%H3462>slept<s%> under <S%H259>a<s%> juniper <S%H7574>tree;<s%> and <S%H4397>behold,<s%> an angel <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said to <S%H6965>him,<s%> "Arise and <S%H398>eat!<s%>"

He <S%H5027>looked,<s%> and <S%H4763>behold,<s%> there was at his head a <S%H5692>cake<s%> baked on the <S%H7529>coals,<s%> and a <S%H6835>jar<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%> He <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank,<s%> and lay <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came <S%H7725>again<s%> the second <S%H8145>time,<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, <S%H6965>"Arise<s%> and <S%H398>eat,<s%> because the <S%H1870>journey<s%> is too great for <S%H7227>you.<s%>"

He <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> in the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of that <S%H396>food<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%> to <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> the <S%H2022>Mount<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

He <S%H935>came<s%> there to a <S%H4631>cave,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H1697>there;<s%> and behold, the word of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>him,<s%> and he said to <S%H452>him,<s%> "What are you doing here, Elijah?"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have been <S%H7065>very<s%> <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies;<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> your <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> thrown <S%H2040>down<s%> your <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H2026>slain<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> <S%H3498>I,<s%> even I only, am left; and they <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life,<s%> to take it <S%H3947>away.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Go <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>" <S%H3068>Behold,<s%> Yahweh passed <S%H5674>by,<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H6561>tore<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and broke in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> the <S%H5553>rocks<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was not in the <S%H7307>wind.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> an <S%H7494>earthquake;<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was not in the <S%H7494>earthquake.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3068>passed;<s%> but Yahweh was not in the <S%H784>fire:<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> a <S%H1827>still<s%> <S%H1851>small<s%> <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

It was <S%H452>so,<s%> when Elijah <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3874>it,<s%> that he wrapped his <S%H6440>face<s%> in his <S%H155>mantle,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6607>in<s%> the entrance of the <S%H4631>cave.<s%> <S%H6963>Behold,<s%> a voice came to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, "What are you doing <S%H452>here,<s%> Elijah?"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have been <S%H7065>very<s%> <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies;<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> your <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> thrown <S%H2040>down<s%> your <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H2026>slain<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> <S%H3498>I,<s%> even I only, am left; and they <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life,<s%> to take it <S%H3947>away.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Go, <S%H7725>return<s%> on your <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%> When you <S%H935>arrive,<s%> you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H758>Syria.<s%>

You shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> of Abel <S%H65>Meholah<s%> to be prophet in your <S%H5030>place.<s%>

It shall <S%H4422>happen,<s%> that he who escapes from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H2371>Hazael,<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> will <S%H4191>kill;<s%> and he who <S%H4422>escapes<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> <S%H477>Elisha<s%> will <S%H4191>kill.<s%>

Yet will I <S%H7604>leave<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> all the <S%H1290>knees<s%> which have not <S%H3766>bowed<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and every <S%H6310>mouth<s%> which has not kissed <S%H5401>him.<s%>"

So he <S%H3212>departed<s%> <S%H4672>there,<s%> and found <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8202>Shaphat,<s%> who was <S%H2790>plowing,<s%> with <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of oxen <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8147>him,<s%> and he with the twelfth: and <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> over to <S%H7993>him,<s%> and cast his mantle on <S%H155>him.<s%>

He <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let me please <S%H5401>kiss<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H517>mother,<s%> and then I will <S%H3212>follow<s%> <S%H559>you.<s%>" He said to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Go back <S%H7725>again;<s%> for what have I done to <S%H6213>you?<s%>"

He <S%H7725>returned<s%> from following <S%H310>him,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H2076>killed<s%> <S%H1310>them,<s%> and boiled their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H398>ate.<s%> Then he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and served <S%H8334>him.<s%>
